/*: Configuration for Torn City API endpoints
Frequency format follows ISO 8601 duration standard:
append = Add new records to existing data using MERGE (upsert based on id field)
replace = Replace all existing data with new data
For append mode, records are deduplicated using the 'id' field as the unique key
MERGE statement is used for efficient upserts (update existing, insert new)
max_retries = Maximum number of retry attempts for failed requests
retry_delay = Delay in seconds between retry attempts
selection = Array of data selections to request from the API
rate_limit = Maximum API requests per minute
timeout = API request timeout in seconds
timezone = Timezone for scheduling (IANA timezone identifier, e.g., America/Chicago for Central time)
